fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Choose to camp outside a player's house during the day
- Choose to communicate to Insurgents during the day. 2 Uses.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you camp outside a player's house, the following night, if someone attempts to attack that player, their ability will fail and you will attack them. ~~I am putting too many 'RB attacker and replace their attack' roles in this alignment lmao~~
- When you choose to communicate to Insurgents, they will be informed who's house you chose to camp outside at the start of next night.  You will also learn who decides to visit your target the following night.
